data.meta_site_name: Obituary for Joene  Gail Weve | Wulf-Ast Mortuary
data.text:
Joene Gail Weve, 77, passed away on June 21, 2021. She was born January 28, 1944 to John Henry and Selma Elizabeth (Grimsman) Beagley. She married John "Nick" Weve on May 31, 1960. She was preceded in death by her parents John and Selma, husband, John, and son, Joshua Lee Weve. She is survived by her daughter, Tammy (Dale) Lies; sons, Jonathan Weve, Jerome (Tonya) Weve, and Jeffrey (Christy) Weve; brother, Jerry (Betty) Beagley; 15 Grandchildren, and 14 Great-Grandchildren.

Visitation will be on Thursday, June 24, 2021 from 6:00 - 8:00 PM at the Wulf-Ast Mortuary, 120 N. King St, Mount Hope, KS. Funeral Services will be held Friday, June 25, 2021 at 10:00 AM at the Mount Hope Bible Fellowship Church, 111 S Thomas, Mount Hope, KS.

In lieu of flowers, memorials may be made to the Mount Hope EMS, Mount Hope Fire Department, or the Mount Hope Library.
